yes, actually, it did denounce them; I'm surprised you didn't notice the news reports. Here's the links.

blatant POV. Many (including many UN member nations) do not consider Hizbollah to be terrorist.

It's not a matter of "ambiguity"; the Hezbollah that fought occupying Israeli soldiers, that fires into Shebaa Farms, and that stands for election in the Lebanese Parliament are the same organization.
